about_the_game:
Overview:
Welcome to Is this a platformer, a fast paced action platformer , Get ready to embark on a side-splitting journey through a world filled with quirky characters, ridiculous obstacles, and laugh-out-loud moments at every turn.

In "Is this a platformer'. players take on the role of kenzu, a young Japanese video game otaku on a quest to rescue his brother from a weird creature after being pulled into a video game.



Art Style:
In Is This A Platformer, the pixel art style brings the vibrant world to life with a charming retro flair. Imagine colorful, chunky pixels that harken back to the golden age of classic platformers, combined with modern flourishes to create a visually captivating experience.

And come on where else did you see a laughing sun and a screaming grapes? also we have a cool Kaboom effect.



Gameplay:
In is this a platformer the player is just a normal person that jumps and punchs the enemy and fight with precise movement EVERY JUMP AND MOVE COUNTS!
Boss fights are epic showdowns that combine challenging platforming gameplay with outrageous humor and larger-than-life adversaries.
I am certain you can't fight this boss with your gaming skills, disagree? Prove me wrong.

name: Is This A Platformer?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-1215U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel UHD graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Play a fast paced action platformer where you fight grapes and a banana to save your dump brother.
